description_for_human: A cozy bedtime story app for parent to share with their kids or love ones, featuring classic fairy tales and cultural folktales. Free stories available. [Download Night Tales on the App Store](https://apps.apple.com/app/idYourAppID).
description_for_model: Night Tales is an iOS bedtime story app offering classic and cultural fairy tales for children and adults. Includes a free tier with premium stories behind a subscription. No user login required; uses Apple ID and StoreKit 2. [Download Night Tales on the App Store](https://apps.apple.com/app/idYourAppID).
